Blog.post: Under My Skin was released in Singapore on 24th May 2004 and I went around the CBD to look for it even though I had fractured a 3 toes, but there was no Under My Skin. In the end, my friend found it at Century Square and helped me buy it. I was so grateful. Anyway, you can go get it now. It costs $17.90 in Sembawang stores and it comes with a poster of her and a secret password to enter a contest to win tickets to her private concert. Quickly get the album now, the posters are limited and the contest ends on 31st July. Signing off ;)

My photos are currently in another computer, so i'll show you my collection another day and teach you how to take those photos. Anybody can take good photos, but if you have a creative flare, you'll be fantastic. Anyway, photography can be learnt to a certain extent, so i'll teach what i know. ;)

If you're singaporean, then you should know the radio station Perfect10. Anyway, let me tell you about this week's chart. No. 3 was Don't Tell Me by Avril Lavigne, No. 2 is My Band by D12 & Eminem and No. 1 is Hoobastank's The Reason.

Avril Lavigne is releasing her 2nd album, Under My Skin , and it's gonna be officially out on 25th May 2004 . All fans should go buy one!!! Anyway, if you wanna have a preview of the songs in her new album, you can visit http://club.mp3search.ru/album.html?id=13804 . Do remeber, if you wanna download you gotta pay, but it's free to listen. Yeah, and about the signing up with them, it's free and you only need to give your email address. Any comments please tell me.
It debuted on mtv trl on June 8th and you can watch it on yahoo launch! Go buy her album if you haven't got 1!
Under My Skin fell to No.5 this week on Billboard Album chart. *sigh* falling so quickly!!! How can that be?? Go support her by buying an album!!! Quick!!!
Her album fell to no. 3, so fast! I cannot believe it!!! Cannot be lah!!!

The video for "My Happy Ending" -- the second single off of "Under My Skin" -- is scheduled to debut on MTV's TRL on Monday, June 28. The world premiere of the video will be on Yahoo's Launch Music service the weekend before. Look for it and watch it on www.yahoo.com or www.launch.com. PS: Go buy this month's seventeen to get an Avril Poster free!
Avril's Don't Tell Me dropped from 9 to 11. Website at http://www.billboard.com/bb/charts/airplay/mainstream_top40.jsp
Avril's at 11 after going up 1 spot. Website at http://www.billboard.com/bb/charts/airplay/adult_top40.jsp
Avril's Don't Tell Me no. 13, still stuck. Check out the site at http://www.billboard.com/bb/charts/airplay/adult.jsp
Don't Tell Me is stuck at No.25, I think it's time for My Happy Ending to hit the charts. Check out the website at http://www.billboard.com/bb/charts/hot100.jsp urlLink
Avril's Under My Skin dropped from 1 to 2. So, go support her and buy her album. Prevent her from falling!!! Check the billboard album chart at http://www.billboard.com/bb/charts/bb200.jsp urlLink
Avril's at No. 11 this week, at least it's quite high. Go check the website at http://www.rick.com/top40chart.html Go! Go! urlLink
Avril's Don't Tell Me dropped from 6 to 8, that's bad! Go buy 8 days and vote for her Don't Tell Me. Check out the chart at http://perfect10.mediacorpradio.com/Top20.htm urlLink
urlLink This may not be Avril, but this is Michelle Branch getting sexy in Maxim. urlLink
urlLink Rocking AVRIL!!! urlLink
Birth Date September 27, 1984 Hometown Napanee, Canada

Don't Tell Me has been going down the Perfect 10 top 20 charts from the highest it ever got no. 2 all the way down to no. 6 this week. It went up to no. 4 on mtv trl but it went down on the billboard charts. Anyway, My Happy Ending is gonna be released and take the world by storm! I'm sure it'll hit NO.1!!!

Yes! It's final and official that Avril's next single is My Happy Ending off her album, Under My Skin. So go tell all your friends about what you just learnt and spread the love for Avril. Anyway, if you haven't bought her album, quick get one now! HURRY!!! As I was saying about posters, you can buy them from www.avril-lavigne.com or if you're from Singapore, go to the HMV at The Heeren Shopson the 3rd floor out side the classical section (if I remember correctly). Go Crazy about Avril, Fans!

I'm not that type who knows poster shops but I was so excited when I found 2 Avril posters at The Heeren Shop's HMV. I was just looking around and I found them. Anyway, Avril fans from Singapore can go there and buy them, their numbers are 32 & 36 but be warned, they cost $14 EACH, so be prepared with $28. Ok that's all!

If you've been visiting my blog, then I'm sorry to tell you that it would only be updated once a month from now on. If you wanna know stuff about Avril, just visit urlLink http://avrilportal.bravehost.com That site is updated very regularly. Thank you for your great support!
Visit urlLink http://avrilportal.bravehost.com
urlLink Less make up. Look a little like Michelle Branch. I don't want to put her pic with thick make up (she looks like a pontianak). urlLink
urlLink looking cool, huh! urlLink
urlLink Go Girl! urlLink
I found that there haven't been new albums worth buying these few weeks. This must be the reason why Fadhil(Faith Hill) resorted to Utada Hikaru. Aiyah, this kind of people!
It seems that several people have been heeding my advice and have bought Avril's Under My Skin. It has gone up to No. 5 this week! Fantastic!!
Quickly buy a copy of Under My Skin if you haven't 'cause it's falling.... It has fallen to no. 10 this week. That's bad!

Avril's My Happy Ending has been released and now it's time to vote! For the whole world: Vote for My Happy Ending on mtv trl and your local chart. For Singapore: You can vote for My Happy Ending by buying copies of 8 Days magazine and cut out the small part that is to be sent to perfect10 for voting. Then, fill in your particulars and My Happy Ending. Oh, Oh, So much for her happy ending, oh,oh,oh
